title: Looking for Master+ Players
body:
Hey Guys,

We are starting up a team of Master Tier+ players that has a goal of playing in the OPL. Obviously we are a very serious team with an already implemented management team. We expect at minimum 20 hours a week of practice with 1 on 1 coaching and soloQ on top of that. If you're below the requirements you won't be considered, Diamond I is the complete minimum requirement for the team.

***Only Mid Role remaining***

Requirements:
1. Over 17 Years old
2. Working Microphone
3. Stable Internet
4. Great Mechanics and Game Knowledge
5. Good Mentality
6. Able to take and provide constructive criticism
7. Free at least 30-40 hours a week
8. Diverse Champion Pool

Thanks for your time,
AusieJamster

replies.body: Let me know when you want a real player in your team.

White puma u been round for abit i remember alst year when you tried to make ur own team.. fell flat on its face. Theres the requirements if u dont meet them dont meet them, then dont bother applying..

> [{quoted}](name=AusieJamster,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=TAufFLUM,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-08-10T16:16:47.010+0000)
>Free at least 30-40 hours a week

Good luck lol
Free 30-40 hours a week? that's more time then Chiefs have to play LoL per week.
So basically any player already in the opl (lets mimic them)
I'm unsure how making a team is copying OPL teams?
with the standards you have thats OPL standard

this are pretty crazy standards to be held to. you basicalyl want someone with no job, no uni/tafe and just league?
good luck

I am everything there except diamond 1+

But he won't even trial me to allow me to prove him wrong.
